article_title: Body of Supernova festival hostage recovered from Gaza.
sentence: No  details  have  been  provided  on  how  or  when  he  died,  but  the  military  said  an  "identification  procedure"  had  been  carried  out  by  medics,  military  rabbis  and  forensic  experts.

article_title: Body of Supernova festival hostage recovered from Gaza.
sentence: More  than  130  hostages  taken  from  Israel  are  thought  to  remain  in  Gaza,  though  some  have  been  declared  dead  in  absentia  by  Israeli  authorities.
